newsitem.title: USA: Syratech stake raised by Gabelli group.
newsitem.headline: Syratech stake raised by Gabelli group.

text.p: A group led by New York investment manager Mario Gabelli said Tuesday it raised its stake in Syratech Corp to 1,285,700 common shares or 14.82 percent from 11.70 percent.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include a net 170,700 common shares bought between March 5 and March 7 at prices ranging from $31.25 to $31.75 per share.
Syratech, of East Boston, Mass., designs, manufactures, imports and markets a diverse portfolio of table top giftware and seasonal products.
